title: Real-Life-Based Probability Exploration: RME Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and ratio concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-accessible LMS environment, designed around activity-based learning using everyday probability examples

learning_goals: Fundamental probability concepts (experimental/mathematical probability) can be explained with over 80% accuracy through real-life case analyses
A systematic process of data collection → pattern analysis → mathematical modeling can be applied to solve probability problems
The ability to logically present probability problem-solving processes is enhanced through online collaboration with learning peers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
